page.title: 11FAMILY LIFE (a)
page.content: The Layton family gave this account of a typical weekday in the life of their family. The family usually gets up at 7.30am. Each member washes, dresses and prepares for the duties of the day. Mrs. Layton, after breakfast, catches the bus to New Houghton where she works as an assistant in a food market.Her husband, Frederick, who works at the colliery in Shirebrook is collected by the N.C.B. bus at 8.3O. Their only daughter Amanda aged fourteen years goes to the local Comprehensive school and catches the bus at 8.3Oam, using her free pass and arrives at school at 8.5Oam. In the evening Mrs. Layton arrives off the 4.3O bus. During the working day Mrs. Layton would be helping to stock up the shelves and ordering new stock as well as working on the cashout tills.
